data.introduce: 用户调用接口实现电子行程单的重推。重推预览完成返回 发送邮箱是否成功标志、发送手机是否成功标 志。请求行程单信息、票号、电子邮箱地址、电话号码 及 电子发票 Base64 pngFile 版式文件。。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"office","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"office","children":[]},{"name":"itineraryNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"行程单号（需由电子 行程单开具接口的返 回 报文 中 itineraryNumber 字段 获取)","children":[]},{"name":"ticketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]},{"name":"emailAddress","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"电子邮箱地址（支持 多邮箱发送，分隔符 为采用半角英文分号 “;”分割,字符串长度 最大支持 200，示例 可见测试样例）","children":[]},{"name":"telephoneNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"电话号码","children":[]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"erptSendResInfo","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"emailInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"发送邮箱是否成功标志","children":[]},{"name":"mobileInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"发送电话是否成功标志","children":[]}]},{"name":"message","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":403,"name":"","msg":"","msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":-390,"name":"","msg":"IBESERVICE_ERROR","msgZh":"IBE服务异常"},{"code":-402,"name":"","msg":"INPUT_ERROR","msgZh":"INPUT_ERROR"}]
